ystic adnexal carcinoma
What are the treatments for Microcystic adnexal carcinoma ?,"Is radiation therapy a recommended treatment for microcystic adnexal carcinoma? Unfortunately, because microcystic adnexal carcinoma is a rare cancer, there is currently not enough information to determine if radiation therapy is an effective treatment for this disease.
